Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ActionHandler
public class ActionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
ActionHandler class handles the answers from the server notifying the correct part of the GUI or CLI through property change listeners.

    Method fireMinotaurMove updates the clientBoard after receiving a Minotaur's move answer.
    private void fireOtherPlayerLost​(PlayerLostMessage answer)
    Method fireOtherPlayerLost unregisters loser from modelView and updates CLI after receiving a message with the loser.
    private void fireSelectSpaces​(SelectSpacesMessage answer)
    Method fireSelectSpaces fires selected spaces from the answer to modelView and updates CLI.
    private void fireSelectWorker()
    Method fireSelectWorker updates CLI after a StartTurnMessage.
    void fullGamePhase​(Answer answer)
    Method fullGamePhase handles an answer of the full game phase (like a move, build or god-use action).
    void initialGamePhase​(Answer answer)
    Method initialGamePhase handles the server answers of the initial game phase and notifies the view relying on the server request through a property change listener.

    Method modifiedTurnAction handles messages from gods with turn phases different from normal ones and fires commands to CLI.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionHandler

      public ActionHandler​(CLI cli, ModelView modelView)
      Constructor of the ActionHandler in case players are using the CLI.
      Parameters:
      cli - of type CLI - the command line interface reference.
      modelView - of type ModelView - the structure, stored into the client, containing simple logic of the model.

    • ActionHandler

      public ActionHandler​(GUI gui, ModelView modelView)
      Constructor of the ActionHandler in case players are using the GUI.
      Parameters:
      gui - of type GUI - the graphical user interface reference.
      modelView - of type ModelView - the structure, stored into the client, containing simple logic of the model.

  • Method Details

    • fullGamePhase

      public void fullGamePhase​(Answer answer)
      Method fullGamePhase handles an answer of the full game phase (like a move, build or god-use action).
      Parameters:
      answer - of type Answer - the answer received from the server.

    • fireBuildMenu

      private void fireBuildMenu()
      Method fireBuildMenu defines booleans used for the method updateCLI in CLI.java based on the type of god.

    • modifiedTurnAction

      private void modifiedTurnAction​(ModifiedTurnMessage answer)
      Method modifiedTurnAction handles messages from gods with turn phases different from normal ones and fires commands to CLI.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type ModifiedTurnMessage - the answer received from the server.

    • defineDoubleMove

      private void defineDoubleMove​(DoubleMoveMessage answer, ClientBoard clientBoard, java.lang.String message)
      Method defineDoubleMove defines the type of the move message received based on gods with the ability to move other ones.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type DoubleMoveMessage - the answer received from the server.
      clientBoard - of type ClientBoard - the clientBoard.
      message - of type String - the message forwarded to CLI.

    • updateClientBoardMove

      private void updateClientBoardMove​(Answer answer, ClientBoard clientBoard)
      Method updateClientBoardMove updates clientBoard after receiving a move answer.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type Answer - the answer received from the server.
      clientBoard - of type ClientBoard - the clientBoard.

      Method checkTurnActive checks if turn is active.

    • initialGamePhase

      public void initialGamePhase​(Answer answer)
      Method initialGamePhase handles the server answers of the initial game phase and notifies the view relying on the server request through a property change listener.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type Answer - the answer received from the server.

    • answerHandler

      public void answerHandler()
      Method answerHandler handles the answer received from the server. It calls the client interface passing values relying on the type of answer the server has sent.

    • fireOtherPlayerLost

      private void fireOtherPlayerLost​(PlayerLostMessage answer)
      Method fireOtherPlayerLost unregisters loser from modelView and updates CLI after receiving a message with the loser.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type PlayerLostMessage - the answer received from the server.

    • fireClosedConnectionCli

      private void fireClosedConnectionCli​(Answer answer)
      Method fireClosedConnectionCli closes connection to client.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type Answer - close connection answer from the server.

      private void fireGameError​(Answer answer)
      Method fireGameError prints an error.
      Parameters:
      answer - of type Answer - the answer from the server.

    • fireCustomMessage

      private void fireCustomMessage​(Answer answer)

      Parameters:
      answer - of type Answer - the custom message answer from the server.
